attributes.action: Stop giving foreign aid to countries that don't need it and spend it here instead.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We believe that foreign aid should only be given to countries that actually need it for example when there is a natural disaster. The rest of the time our money should be spent here in the U.K. More money needs to be spent in this country on our roads for example and not in other countries

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
